name: Diamand Necklaces
description: A stunning Raj Ratan necklace, crafted with precision and elegance, designed to add a touch of sophistication to your traditional occasions. Explore the timeless charm of Dynamic Jewellery!
longDescription: This necklace is crafted with care and attention to detail, ensuring durability and unmatched beauty. Perfect for weddings and traditional ceremonies. Comes with free shipping.

reviews.text: Good quality but a bit heavy.
